text: it's 11 p.m. now in central Vietnam and
the temperature is 235 degree Celsius or
95 Fahrenheit this summer is so hot that
I find myself searching constantly for
drinks and desserts that can quench my
thirst walking along this naive foot
street you can find people selling many
kinds of drinks and desserts from fruit
mix to black sesame puddings to flan etc
I've tried them all and have decided
that the best one to have on hot days
like this is symbaloo a very special
sweet and cold soup of Cantonese origin
it contains many ingredients that can
help your body cool down I've received
so many requests from you guys for this
one as well so let's give it a try at
home so for this dessert there's many
Chinese herbal ingredients in small
quantity so it makes no sense buying
them individually it's best to buy a
pack of some balloon like this at Asian
or Chinese store inside you will have a
few slices of lotus root and some
cassava slices some ginseng slices some
dried seaweed with some snow fungus
there's also a small pack of / Bali or
baba in Vietnamese and a pack of red 2
tubes or Tata
there's also a small tube of vanilla
powder inside I also bought an extra
chain of dried lotus seeds it looks
really pretty just like a pearl necklace
the symbol and pack that you buy could
have some other items like dried long
guns
what berries or gingko nuts as well they
all have really great cooling effects
for the body
first thing you want to soak the dry
slaughter see the per Bali or Baba and
the cassava in water for about four to
five hours to soften these take longer
to cook so it's better if you saw in
water beforehand so you can reduce the
cooking time next bring three cups of
water to a boy then I have the probe
Alice and the cassava and cook for about
25 to 30 minutes meanwhile you can soak
the shredded dried seaweed and the snow
fungus autumn day in water for about 15
minutes to bloom after a while you can
see the dried seaweed turns quite dark
green cut in shorter lengths so it's
easier to eat look at that the snow
fungus now turns really pretty just like
corals in the sea tear the white part
into smaller pieces and it's cut the
root you also want to soak the ginseng
slices the two tubes and the lotus root
slices in water for a couple minutes to
soften after 30 minutes there are
cassava turns soft and translucent and
the poor bodies are also soft now train
and discard the water and rings well to
remove the starch
cut the cassava into smaller pieces now
if you another saucepan with 1 liter of
water and bring to a boil 1/2 the dry
low doses and cook until soft it will
taste somewhere from 15 to 25 minutes
depending on the card of lotuses that
you use skim off the front to keep the
water player then add the flour and the
pur valley back add 150 gram of rock
sugar and cook until it's completely
dissolved simmer for 10 minutes so that
the Sombra and lotuses can absorb the
sweetness then add the rest of the
ingredients with apps being salt the
retro tubes or dry long-guns if any
should be added at last before you turn
off the heat take off the heat and add
the vanilla powder and there you have it
serve cold with some cross-eyes in a
tall glass mmm is so refreshing and
delicious it's always great to have
desserts that not only taste good and
make you feel good but also a great to
medical health effects to your body
isn't it I hope you like it and thank
you for watching bye
